title: Slip on wet concrete
description: Worker slipped on freshly washed concrete surface near column C-7. Minor knee abrasion treated with first aid. Worker returned to duty same day.

title: Falling object near miss
description: Unsecured bolt bag fell from Level 3 steel erection area. No workers in drop zone. Area immediately barricaded and crew retrained on tool tethering.

title: Heat exhaustion incident
description: Ironworker experienced dizziness and nausea during afternoon steel erection. Treated with water and shade rest. Modified work schedule implemented.

title: Crane near miss
description: Tower crane load swung within 5 feet of occupied man-lift during high winds. Operations suspended and wind speed monitoring protocol revised.

title: Caught-between incident
description: Worker's glove caught in rebar tying machine. Glove torn but no injury to hand. Machine safety guard inspected and reset procedure reinforced.

title: Pile driving vibration complaint
description: Adjacent property owner reported cracking in masonry wall potentially caused by pile driving vibration. Pre-construction survey reviewed and vibration monitoring increased.

title: Marine diesel spill
description: Small diesel fuel leak from pile driving hammer hydraulic line. Approximately 2 gallons spilled on barge deck. Contained with absorbent pads. No water contamination.

title: Worker laceration on bridge rebar
description: Worker sustained 3-inch laceration on forearm from exposed rebar end. Wound cleaned and sutured at local clinic. Worker returned next day on modified duty.

title: Traffic incident near work zone
description: Civilian vehicle struck temporary barrier at construction zone entrance. No worker injuries. Barrier damaged and replaced. Traffic control plan reviewed.

title: Scaffold collapse near miss
description: Partially erected scaffold section shifted due to improperly secured base plates. No workers on scaffold at time. Scaffold erected by competent person and reinspected.

title: Electrical arc flash
description: Electrician experienced minor arc flash when testing emergency panel. Flash protective clothing prevented injury. Lockout tagout procedure verified and reinforced.

title: Fall from ladder
description: Worker fell 4 feet from A-frame ladder while installing ceiling grid. Bruised hip treated with ice. Ladder inspected and found to have damaged spreader lock.
